title: Automation Exercise
summary: This is a practice website called AutomationExercise for QA engineers of all levels to practice automation and API testing. It provides test cases and API lists for practice, categorized by gender (women, men, kids) and brands (e.g., POLO, H&M).

title: Automation Exercise - Contact Us
summary: The page is a 'Contact Us' form for the Automation Exercise website. It includes a contact form for testing purposes, a feedback section, and a subscription section.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product, 'Full Sleeves Top Cherry - Pink', including its category (Kids > Tops & Shirts), price (Rs. 679), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Kookie Kids). It also allows users to add the product to the cart, write and submit a review, and subscribe to receive updates.

title: Automation Exercise - Dress Products
summary: This webpage displays dress products for women in an online store. It includes product listings with prices, images, and 'Add to cart' buttons. The page also features category filters (Women, Men, Kids), brand filters (POLO, H&M, etc.), and links to other sections of the website (Home, Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, Contact us).

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product, 'Premium Polo T-Shirts', including its category (Men > Tshirts), price (Rs. 1500), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Polo). The page also features category filters (WOMEN, MEN, KIDS, BRANDS) and specific brand filters (POLO, H&M, MADAME, MAST & HARBOUR, BABYHUG, ALLEN SOLLY JUNIOR, KOOKIE KIDS, BIBA). The page also has links to Home, Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, and Contact us.

title: Automation Exercise - Biba Products
summary: This is the homepage of an e-commerce website called Biba Products. There are also category filters for Women, Men, and Kids, as well as brand filters for POLO, H&M, MADAME, MAST & HARBOUR, BABYHUG, ALLEN SOLLY JUNIOR, and KOOKIE KIDS.

title: Automation Practice for API Testing
summary: This webpage provides a platform for API testing practice. It includes a list of APIs with scenarios for automation practice, covering functionalities like retrieving product lists, posting data, searching products, and user login verification.
